languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, помимо орудий экипаж прислал на мостик в знак своей вечной признательности еще одну находку — древний механизм, который техножрецы нарекли Селестиум Обсерваторум. К сожалению, его дух машины не откликается на их обряды, так что устройство носит скорее символическое и эстетическое назначение. Желаете ли взглянуть?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, помимо орудий экипаж прислал на мостик знак своей вечной признательности — пласталевый барельеф герба фон Валанциус. Желаете ли взглянуть?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, помимо орудий экипаж прислал на мостик в знак своей вечной признательности еще одну находку — древний механизм, который техножрецы нарекли Селестиум Обсерваторум. К сожалению, его дух машины не откликается на их обряды, так что устройство носит скорее символическое и эстетическое назначение. Желаете ли взглянуть?"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart of the weapons the crew sent a sign of its eternal appreciation to the bridge, a plasteel bas-relief of the von Valancius coat of arms. Would you like to take a look?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew sent a sign of its eternal gratitude to the bridge — a plasteel sculpt of the von Valancius coat of arms. Would you like to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “大人，除了武器之外，船员们还向舰桥送了一件礼物，代表他们永恒不变的谢意。那是台极为古老的装置，我们的技术神甫称之为观星台。遗憾的是，它的机魂拒绝执行仪式，因此这台机器恐怕只能当做装饰品，无法发挥实际作用。您想现在看看吗？”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: “大人，除了武器之外，船员们还向舰桥送了一件礼物——饰有冯·瓦兰修斯家族纹章的塑钢雕像，代表他们永恒不变的谢意。您想现在看看吗？”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, en plus des armes, l'équipage a également fait envoyer un autre objet sur le pont en témoignage de sa gratitude éternelle. Il s'agit d'un mécanisme très ancien, que nos technoprêtres ont surnommé le Celestium Observatorum. Hélas, son esprit de la machine refuse de répondre à leurs rites, ce qui rend l'appareil plus symbolique et décoratif que pratique. Voulez-vous le voir ? »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, en plus des armes, l'équipage a également fait envoyer un autre objet sur le pont en témoignage de sa gratitude éternelle. Il s'agit d'un mécanisme très ancien, que nos technoprêtres ont surnommé le Celestium Observatorum. Hélas, son esprit de la machine refuse de répondre à leurs rites, ce qui rend l'appareil plus symbolique et décoratif que pratique. Voulez-vous le voir ? »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「陛下、武器の他にも、クルーが永遠の感謝の証として、さらなる発見物をブリッジに持ってきました。非常に古い機構で、技術司祭はセレスティウム天測儀と名付けました。残念ながら、その機械精霊は彼らの儀式に耳を傾けることを拒んでおり、それによってこの装置は実用的というよりは美的で象徴的なものとなってしまっております。ご覧になりますか？」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、武器の他にも、クルーが永遠の感謝の証として、さらなる発見物をブリッジに持ってきました。非常に古い機構で、技術司祭はセレスティウム天測儀と名付けました。残念ながら、その機械精霊は彼らの儀式に耳を傾けることを拒んでおり、それによってこの装置は実用的というよりは美的で象徴的なものとなってしまっております。ご覧になりますか？」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, además de las armas, la tripulación ha enviado una muestra de su gratitud al puente. Se trata de un mecanismo muy antiguo que nuestros tecnosacerdotes han llamado el Celestium Observatorum. Por desgracia, su espíritu máquina se niega a escuchar los ritos, por lo que el dispositivo es más ornamental que práctico. ¿Le gustaría verlo?».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, además de las armas, la tripulación ha enviado una muestra de su gratitud al puente. Se trata de una escultura en plastiacero del escudo de armas de la casa von Valancius. ¿Le gustaría verla?».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, neben den Waffen hat die Crew als Zeichen ihrer ewigen Dankbarkeit einen weiteren Fund auf die Brücke geschickt ... einen überaus alten Mechanismus, den unsere Techpriester als 'Celestium Observatorum' bezeichnen. Leider weigert sich sein Maschinengeist, sich ihren Riten zu unterwerfen, wodurch das Gerät eher symbolischer Natur und nur von geringem praktischen Nutzen ist. Wollt Ihr es sehen?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, zusätzlich zu den Waffen hat die Crew noch ein Zeichen ihres ewigen Danks auf die Brücke geschickt — eine Plaststahl-Skulptur des Wappens der Familie von Valancius. Möchtet Ihr sie sehen?"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri; mürettebatınız, sonsuz minnettarlıklarının göstergesi olarak silahların yanı sıra güverteye bir şey daha gönderdi. Tekno Rahiplerimizin Celestium Observatorum olarak adlandırdığı, çok eski bir mekanizma. Ne yazık ki makine ruhu, ayinlerine karşılık vermeyi reddediyor. Bu da cihazı kullanışlı olmaktan çok sembolik ve dekoratif kılıyor. Görmek ister misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apart from the weapons, the crew has sent one more find to the bridge as a token of its eternal gratitude — a most ancient mechanism, which our Tech-Priests have dubbed the Celestium Observatorum. Alas, its machine spirit refuses to heed their rites, which makes the device more symbolic and aesthetic than practical in purpose. Do you wish to see it?"
